org.lazywizard.console

Class CommandStore

  • org.lazywizard.console.CommandStore

  • public class CommandStore

    The console mod's internal command storage. You can retrieve detailed information on the loaded commands using this class.

    • Method Detail

      • reloadCommands

        public static void reloadCommands()

        Forces the console to clear its stored commands and reload them from the CSV. If a command fails to load it will not throw an Exception. Instead it will display an error message to the player and continue to load the rest of the commands normally.

        Throws:
        IOException - if the CSV file at CommonStrings#PATH_CSV does not exist or can't be opened.
        JSONException - if the CSV is malformed or missing columns.
        See Also:
        Exception

      • getLoadedCommands

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getLoadedCommands()

        Returns all commands currently loaded by the mod.

        Returns:
        org.jetbrains.dokka.NodeRenderContent@f750fa: A List containing the names of all loaded commands.

      • getApplicableCommands

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getApplicableCommands(org.lazywizard.console.BaseCommand.CommandContext context)

        Returns all commands applicable in the given enum BaseCommand.CommandContext. A command will only be excluded if it contains an opposing tag and does not contain the matching one (ex: for CommandContext#CAMPAIGN_MAP, commands will only be excluded if they contain the tag "combat" or "market" but not the tag "campaign".

        Commands with the tag "console" are assumed to be system-level, and will run anywhere.

        Returns:
        org.jetbrains.dokka.NodeRenderContent@64a8fcab: A List containing the names of all loaded commands that are applicable to the given context.
        See Also:
        enum BaseCommand.CommandContext

      • getAliases

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getAliases()

        Returns all aliases currently registered by the mod.

        Returns:
        org.jetbrains.dokka.NodeRenderContent@45c7997f: A Map containing all registered aliases as keys, with the commands they expand to as values.

      • registerAlias

        public static void registerAlias(java.lang.String alias,
                                 java.lang.String command)

        Registers an alias to be used as shorthand for long or multiple commands..

        Parameters:
        alias - The alias to register.
        command - The command that will be run in place of alias. This can include separators to run multiple commands. If null is passed in, removes any existing alias instead.
        Throws:
        IOException
        JSONException

      • getKnownTags

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getKnownTags()

        Returns all command tags that the mod is currently aware of.

        Returns:
        org.jetbrains.dokka.NodeRenderContent@612d9854: A List containing all tags used by the currently loaded commands.

      • getCommandsWithTag

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getCommandsWithTag(java.lang.String tag)

        Returns all commands with a specific tag.

        Parameters:
        tag - The tag to search for.
        Returns:
        org.jetbrains.dokka.NodeRenderContent@349c4f12: A List containing the names of all loaded commands that use the tag tag.

      • getListeners

        public static java.util.List<org.lazywizard.console.CommandListener> getListeners()

        Returns all interface CommandListeners that are registered with the console.

        Returns:
        org.jetbrains.dokka.NodeRenderContent@355cae07: All registered interface CommandListeners.
        See Also:
        interface CommandListener

      • retrieveCommand

        public static org.lazywizard.console.CommandStore.StoredCommand retrieveCommand(java.lang.String command)

        Retrieves the raw data for a specific command.

        Parameters:
        command - The name of the command to retrieve.
        Returns:
        org.jetbrains.dokka.NodeRenderContent@66f38b53: The class CommandStore.StoredCommand containing all of the data the console needs to use this command, such as its name, class, syntax, helpfile, and what mod registered it.
